segments.text: Did you pack this bag yourself ? Has it been out of your possession at any time before checking-in ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I packed it myself , and it hasn ’ t been out of my possession .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are you bringing in any plants or animal products ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our sniffer dog seems to disagree . Do you mind if we look in your suitcase ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . Go right ahead .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s traditional Chinese Medicine . I mix it with hot water like tea . Sorry . I forgot about it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are these red things sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no ! I forgot about those too ! Those are Chinese sausages for my Aunt Lily .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m sorry sir , but you can ’ t take any of this into the country . We will also have to check your carry-on . Please step this way . Don ’ t ’ be nervous ; we ’ ll just look through it briefly and then
segments.speaker: S1
